Harpy.name: Desharr
Harpy.description: A busty close to human looking alien bartender. The girl is squeezed into a black top with a plunging cleavage and a set of working pants wrapped around her rear. She has a pair of fluffy reddish tails protruding about her pants and a pair of triangular vulpine ears atop her head. She's busily running the bar and is backed by a sign declaring 'Desshy's' and an assortment of drink bottles.
